ModMetaData.name: [CM] Ideology DLC Texture Upscale
ModMetaData.author: CopperMonster
ModMetaData.description:
V1.1: updated to 1.4
V1.0 - This mod: Makes the Spikecore Style of the Parka/ Jacket/ Duster Actually look like metal spikes. However, currently spikecore flackjackets have a chance to be crafted in white, this does not affect pirates with spikecore flakjackets, only crafted ones??? Added a 20% transparency to Burkas and animalStyle Cataphract Helmets.
All Textures have been upscaled with some exceptions that were already a high ennough texture. The improvements also include the different styles for everything such as the tables. Textures that have improved include: Clothing / Tattoos / Dryads Buildings / ArtSlabs / Sculptures Plants / Ruins / Relics
Feel free to use my textures if you were wanting to use ideology textures for a mod project!
